alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Door County through 915 PM CDT... At 812 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Egg Harbor, or 12 miles east of Marinette, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Egg Harbor around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Jacksonport and Baileys Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
